remarks: Lemma for ~ irrapx1 .  Switching to real intervals and fraction syntax. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Sep-2014.)
statement:
irrapxlem5 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ ) -> E. x e. QQ ( 0 < x /\ ( abs ` ( x - A ) ) < B /\ ( abs ` ( x - A ) ) < ( ( denom ` x ) ^ -u 2 ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
